root: ^I remember how difficult it was for Grandpa to settle with a style for the roof.
^He wanted it to represent a place he and grandma had shared a wonderful memory,
^I can’t remember where it was from though.
^They didn’t always agree with one another but I remember how fond they were of each other.
^Maybe Rebecca would know where it’s from...
^Why am I thinking about her now?
^Wasn’t the whole reason for going here to not do that?
^Oh well. What’s next on the list?
